verbose_text: Lim et al. [XREF_BIBR] reported that three sets of primer targeted rfbJ, fljB, and fliC genes caused specific identification of O4, H :1,2 and H : i antigenic properties, respectively.
evidence: Lim et al. [ XREF_BIBR ] reported that three sets of primer targeted rfbJ, fljB, and fliC genes caused specific identification of O4
